name: 2. L overall bonus
description: It is recommended to play the L map at this difficulty level, which takes effect at 200% difficulty. The experience of computer heroes is 4 times, and the weekly production of urban creatures is 2 times.

chinese.name: 2. L overall bonus
chinese.description: 此难度推荐玩L图，200%难度下生效，电脑英雄4倍经验，城镇生物2倍周产。

author: Nordsoft
